review_data.title: Very good for an airport restaurant
review_data.content: Had a couple of hours to kill before getting a train so had lunch here. Service was good and food was very good. Only issue being we could only get a tiny table for the 4 of us but we coped :-)

review_data.title: Rude and Expensive
review_data.content: The waiter was extremely insulting...he told us that we were dressed from the year 2000 and that it was 2017. Granted we had been traveling for 22 days around the world and we were dressed casually, his attitude was very rude. He also told me...More
